SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents the game board, consisting of a grid of ObjectCards with associated coordinates.
Board.Direction
Represents the four possible directions: UP, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGHT.
Cli
This class is used to manage the cli
Client
This class represents a Client
ClientGameManager
This class represents the client game manager
ClientMain
Main class of the client.
ClientRMI
This class represents an RMI Client
ClientSocket
This class represents a Socket Client
ClientUpdateListener
This interface is used to notify the implementer of an incoming message
ClientUpdater
This class run a process that wait messages from the server and notify the Client whenever one arrives
CliVisual
This class contains all the methods used to print the game in the console
Color
Enumeration of the colors used in the game.
CommonGoal
Represents a common goal in the game.
CommonGoalType1
Six separeted groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type.
CommonGoalType10
Five tiles of the same type forming an X.
CommonGoalType11
Eight tiles of the same type.
CommonGoalType12
Five columns of increasing or decreasingcheight.
CommonGoalType2
Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.
CommonGoalType3
The four corners of the Shelf must have four object cards of the same type.
CommonGoalType4
Four rows each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types.
CommonGoalType5
Four separate groups each containing at least 4 adjacent tiles of the same type.
CommonGoalType6
Two columns each formed by 6 different types of object cards.
CommonGoalType7
Two separate groups of 4 tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square.
CommonGoalType8
Two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles.
CommonGoalType9
Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types.
Connection
This interface that represents a connection with a client
ConnectionRequest
Message class of connection request
ConnectionResponse
Message class of response after a connection request
ConnectionSceneController
Class ConnectionSceneController represents the controller of the connection scene, the scene where the player can choose the connection type and insert their username and the server address
ControllerGame
Controller for the game, handling game logic and interactions between model components.
Coordinate
Represents a 2D coordinate in the game grid with methods to obtain neighboring coordinates.
Coordinate.Direction
Represents the four possible directions for moving from a coordinate in a 2D grid.
CreateGameRequest
Message class to request to create a new game
DeleteLimboRequest
Message class to request to delete the selected cards
DisconnectionListener
This interface need to notify the implementer when the connection with the server is interrupted
DisconnectionMessage
Message class to inform all the clients that a player disconnected
EndGameMessage
Message class to inform the clients that the game is ended
EndGameSceneController
Controller of the end game scene that shows the final ranking
Game
Represents the main game logic, including object card and common goal management.
GameLoadResponse
Message class that is sent when a load game is completed successfully
GameSceneController
Class for the graphical interface of the game
GameSerialized
This class represents the game state, it is used to send the game state to the clients
GameStartMessage
Message class to tell the clients that the game is started
GameStateResponse
Message class to inform the clients about the model changes
Gui
Class Gui represents the Graphical User Interface
GuiManager
Class GuiManager represents the manager of the GUI
JoinGameRequest
Message used to request to join an existing game
JoinGameSceneController
Class JoinGameSceneController represents the controller of the join game scene, the scene where the player can see the list of existing games they can join
JsonReader
This class reads the program's constants from a json file
ListGameRequest
Message used to request the list of available games
ListGameResponse
Message that contains the list of available games
LoadShelfRequest
Message sent by the client to load the shelf of the player
LobbyMessage
Message class used to join or leave the lobby
LobbyPlayersResponse
Message class that is sent when a change is done to the lobby.
LobbySceneController
Class LobbySceneController represents the controller of the lobby scene, the scene where the player waits for the game to start
MenuSceneController
Class MenuSceneController represents the controller of the menu scene, the first scene of the game
Message
This abstract class need to differentiate that the server can send to the client or vice versa
MessageBuilder
This class is used to build messages
MessageContent
Enumeration for the message content
MessageStatus
Enumeration representing the Status of a Response Message
NumberOfPlayersMessage
Message that contains the number of players in a game
NumberPlayersController
Class NumberPlayersController represents the controller of the scene where the player can choose the number of players of the game
ObjectCard
Represents an object card in the game.
ObjectCardRequest
Message sent by the client containing the coordinate of the object card to pick in order to verify if the player can pick it
ObjectCardType
Represents the type of object card in the game.
PersonalGoal
Represents a personal goal for a player in the game.
PersonalGoalCard
Represents a personal goal card in the game, containing a list of personal goals and tracking the number of goals reached.
PingMessage
Empty message used as a ping message
PingTimerTask
This class is a superclass of TimerTask is executed after Client.DISCONNECTION_TIME milliseconds which is scheduled by a Timer, once called notifies the client via a call to DisconnectionListener.onDisconnection()
Player
Represents a player in the game, including their name, current points, shelf, and personal goal card.
PossibleAction
Enumeration for the possible actions
PossibleGameState
Enumeration containing all the possible states that the ControllerGame can have while "controlling" the evolving of the game.
ReconnectionMessage
Message used to handle a reconnection to the server, it is the response of a ReconnectionRequest
ReconnectionRequest
Message used to ask for a reconnection to the server
ReorderLimboRequest
Message used to reorder the selected object cards
Response
Generic response to a request
RMIClientConnection
This interface is the one sent to the RMI server enabling him to send messages to client
RMIConnection
This class represents a RMI Connection with a client
RMIHandler
This interface is the one sent to the RMI client enabling him to send messages to server
RMIHandlerImplementation
This class is the implementation of the interface RMIHandler
Server
This class is the main server class which starts a Socket and an RMI server.
ServerAddressValidator
This class is used to validate the server address
Shelf
Represents a Shelf in the game, which holds ObjectCards.
SocketConnection
This class represents a Socket connection with a client
SocketServer
This class represents a Socket server that listens for new connections
StartGameSceneController
Class StartGameSceneController represents the controller of the scene where the player can choose to create a new game or to join an existing one
TableRowEndScene
This class represents a row of the table of EndGameSceneController
UserPlayerState
Enumeration representing all the possible states that the client round manager can have.
